Package model

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
model.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Healer, Mage, Paladin, Power, Princess, Ranger, Rogue
public abstract class Piece
extends java.lang.Object

    • spell

      public boolean spell()
      Piece can cast a spell, beginning of template method
      Returns:
      a boolean, all pieces except princess return true, as princess cannot cast a spell

    • castSpell

      Executes the affect of the spell
      Parameters:

      Returns:
